results.name: Red Dead Redemption 2

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 - Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - April 2018 Update (v1803)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible

results.short_description:
Red Dead Redemption 2 is an action-adventure game developed by Rockstar Games. It was originally released in 2018. Rockstar Games published the game. Red Dead Redemption 2 has a Metascore of 96, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional". 
You can play Red Dead Redemption 2 on PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, Epic Games Store, Steam and Xbox Store. 
Rob Nelson produced the game. It was scored by Woody Jackson.

results.name: Wanking Simulator

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Graphics: GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Graphics: GTX 550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

results.short_description:
Wanking Simulator is an indie, action, adventure and simulation game developed by MrCiastku. It was originally released in 2020. Ultimate Games published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG. 
Wanking Simulator is available on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

results.name: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.3 LTS or SteamOS Brewmaster
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB) or Radeon HD 6670 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Graphics Drivers: Nvidia: 352, 355 or 358 series driver / AMD: AMD Catalyst (fglrx) 15.9 or better. MESA drivers and Intel Graphics are not currently supported.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.3 LTS or SteamOS Brewmaster
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K (3.3 GHz) or AMD FX-4300 (3.8 GHz)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) or Radeon HD 6970 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Graphics Drivers: Nvidia: 352, 355 or 358 series driver / AMD: AMD Catalyst (fglrx) 15.9 or better. MESA drivers and Intel Graphics are not currently supported.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista (x86 or x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 | AMD Athlon II x3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 | AMD Radeon HD 5800 series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (x86 or x64)
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100T | AMD Phenom II x4 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 | AMD Radeon HD 6800 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

results.short_description:
Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell is an action-adventure game developed by Deep Silver, Volition and High Voltage Software. It came out on 20-01-2015. It was published by Deep Silver. Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell has a Metascore of 66, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". 
You can play Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell on Linux, PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 3. You can purchase the game on Xbox Store, Steam, GOG and Xbox 360 Store. 
It was produced by Jim Boone. It was scored by Malcolm Kirby Jr..

results.name: Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista 64bit, Window 7 64bit, Windows 8 64bit (32bit O/S not supported)
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz or Athlon X2 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or higher with 512MB graphics memory, Intel HD Graphics 2500 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista 64bit, Window 7 64bit, Windows 8 64bit (32bit O/S not supported)
  • Processor: Core i5-2300, Phenom II X4 940 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible card, ATI Radeon 7750, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or higher with 1GB graphics memory, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

results.short_description:
Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition is an action-adventure game developed by Feral Interactive, United Front Games and Square Enix London Studios. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Square Enix. On review aggregator Metacritic, Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition has a score of 76. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
You can play Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition on Xbox One, PC, macOS and PlayStation 4. The game is sold via Xbox Store, PlayStation Store and Steam. 
It was produced by Feargus Carroll and Jeff O'Connell. Jeff Tymoschuk scored the game.

results.name: Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days

requirements_en.minimum:
• OS: Windows XP/Vista/7
  • Processor: Intel 3.0 GHz or AMD 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB (XP), 2 GB (Vista)
  • Graphics: Nvidia 7800 / ATI X1800 or better (Shader Model 3.0, 512 MB Video Memory)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card
  • Controller Support: Xbox 360 Controller

requirements_ru.minimum: Core 2 Duo/Athlon X2 2.5 ГГц,1 Гб памяти,GeForce 7800/Radeon X1800,7.5 Гб на винчестере,интернет-соединение
requirements_ru.recommended: Core 2 Duo/Athlon X2 3 ГГц,2 Гб памяти,GeForce 9800 GTX/Radeon HD 3870,7.5 Гб на винчестере,интернет-соединение

results.short_description:
Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days is an action-shooter game developed by Square Enix and IO Interactive. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Square Enix. On review aggregator Metacritic, Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days has a score of 66. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
You can play Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days on PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. The game is sold via Xbox 360 Store, PlayStation Store and Steam. 
It was scored by Mona Mur.

results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S @ 2.5 GHz or AMD FX-4320 @ 4 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 / AMD R9 270X (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible using the latest drivers
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770@ 3.5 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970/GTX 1060 or AMD R9 390/RX480 (4GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible using the latest drivers

results.short_description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands is an action-shooter massively multiplayer game developed by Ubisoft, Ubisoft Montpellier, Ubisoft Bucharest and Ubisoft Annecy. It was originally released in 2017. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands has a Metascore of 72, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands is available on PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. The game is sold via Steam, PlayStation Store, Xbox Store and Epic Games Store. 
Nouredine Abboud produced the game. It was directed by Eric Couzian. It was scored by Alain Johannes.

seo_text: Are you searching for games like Grand Theft Auto V? Look no further! Here's a list of games similar to Grand Theft Auto V either in the gameplay or in the visual style. If you like Grand Theft Auto V, be sure to check some of these games as well.
